# Form

Participant instructions: For each of the following activities, please indicate your level of confidence in doing the activity without losing your balance or becoming unsteady from choosing one of the percentage points on the scale from 0% to 100% If you do not currently do the activity in question, try and imagine how confident you would be if you had to do the activity. If you normally use a walking aid to do the activity or hold onto someone, rate your confidence as if you were using these supports.

<script>
  function initializeSlider(sliderId) {
    const slider = document.getElementById(sliderId);
    const display = slider.parentElement.querySelector('.slider-value');
    const scoreClass = sliderId.replace('_slider', '_score');
    const scoreElements = document.querySelectorAll(`.${scoreClass}`);
    let hasInteracted = false;

    // Initial default
    display.textContent = 'Not reported';
    scoreElements.forEach(el => {
      el.textContent = 'Not reported';
      el.dataset.value = 'null';  // Set null as default
    });

    slider.addEventListener('input', () => {
      if (!hasInteracted) hasInteracted = true;
      const value = slider.value;
      const valueText = `${value}%`;
      display.textContent = valueText;

      scoreElements.forEach(el => {
        el.textContent = valueText;
        el.dataset.value = value;
      });
    });
  }

  const sliderIds = [
    'item1_slider', 'item2_slider', 'item3_slider', 'item4_slider',
    'item5_slider', 'item6_slider', 'item7_slider', 'item8_slider',
    'item9_slider', 'item10_slider', 'item11_slider', 'item12_slider',
    'item13_slider', 'item14_slider', 'item15_slider', 'item16_slider'
  ];

  sliderIds.forEach(initializeSlider);
</script>

<script>
  function calculateTotalAndMean() {
    const allScores = document.querySelectorAll('[class$="_score"]');
    let total = 0;
    let count = 0;

    allScores.forEach(el => {
      const value = el.dataset.value;
      if (value !== 'null') {
        total += parseInt(value);
        count++;
      }
    });

    const mean = total / 16; // Always divide by 16 as you said

    // Optional: display somewhere
    document.getElementById('total_display').textContent = isNaN(total) ? 'N/A' : `${total}`;
    document.getElementById('mean_display').textContent = isNaN(mean) ? 'N/A' : `${mean.toFixed(1)}`;
  }

  // Call on every slider input
  const sliders = document.querySelectorAll('input[type="range"]');
  sliders.forEach(slider => {
    slider.addEventListener('input', calculateTotalAndMean);
  });
</script>
